article.headline: Houston 73, Texas Southern 66
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Brockeith Pane scored 20 points to lead Houston to a 73-66 victory over Texas Southern on Wednesday night. Houston (4-1) trailed 39-38 with 14:02 remaining after a Sollie Norwood 3-pointer. But the Cougars went on a 16-2 run over the next four minutes to take a 54-41 lead on a Pane layup. Pane had 10 points in the run. The Tigers cut the lead to five with 2:20 remaining on a Matthew Miller layup that capped a 9-1 run, but Texas Southern (1-3) couldn?t get any closer the rest of the way. Robert McKiver added 15 points and six rebounds off the bench for the Cougars, and Zamal Nixon scored 10 points. Dion Dowell added nine points and had 11 rebounds and six blocks. David Burrell led Texas Southern with 19 points. Norwood had 18 points and eight rebounds. Houston led by as many as eight points, 18-10, with 10:59 remaining the first half on two Dowell free throws before Texas Southern outscored the Cougars 17-5 over the next seven minutes to take a 27-23 lead on an Anthony Ike jumper with 3:32 left in the opening half. The Cougars answered with five straight points before the half to go into halftime up 28-27.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
